[vc_row shadow_x_offset=“0″ shadow_y_offset=“0″ shadow_blur=“0″ shadow_spread=“0″ shadow_color=““ css=“.vc_custom_1531906799465{padding-top: 20px !important;}“][vc_column shadow_x_offset=“0″ shadow_y_offset=“0″ shadow_blur=“0″ shadow_spread=“0″ offset=“vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-8″][vc_column_text]Iskoristite formular ispod i pošaljite nam poruku bilo kada. Možete nam poslati upit za smeštaj ili nam napisati bilo šta.

Potrudićemo se da Vam odgovorimo u roku od 48 sati.[/vc_column_text][stm_contact_form_7 form=“172″][/vc_column][vc_column shadow_x_offset=“0″ shadow_y_offset=“0″ shadow_blur=“0″ shadow_spread=“0″ offset=“vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][stm_contacts_widget style=“style_2″ address=“Kaluđerske Bare, Planina Tara, 31250 Bajina Bašta“ phone=“+381640314444″ email=“info@hoteltara.rs“ css=“.vc_custom_1608892248708{background-image: url(https://hotello.stylemixthemes.com/demoimages/frankfurt/contacts_bg.jpg?id=1011) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}“][vc_btn title=“Preuzmite cenovnik“ shape=“square“ size=“lg“ align=“left“ i_icon_fontawesome=“far fa-file-pdf“ button_block=“true“ add_icon=“true“ link=“url:https%3A%2F%2Fhoteltara.rs%2Fhoteltaracenovnik.pdf|target:_blank“][vc_btn title=“Kućni red“ shape=“square“ size=“lg“ align=“left“ i_icon_fontawesome=“far fa-file-pdf“ button_block=“true“ add_icon=“true“ link=“url:http%3A%2F%2Fhoteltara.rs%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2020%2F12%2FGarni-hotel-Tara-KUCNI-RED.pdf|target:_blank“][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=“stretch_row_content_no_spaces“ shadow_x_offset=“0″ shadow_y_offset=“0″ shadow_blur=“0″ shadow_spread=“0″ shadow_color=““ css=“.vc_custom_1528179675214{margin-bottom: -60px !important;}“][vc_column][stm_spacer height=“70″ height_tablet=“50″ height_mobile=“40″][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
